text:
Update on the #ThomasFire: Approximately 96,000 acres burned, with 5% contained. I can’t say it enough, if you are given the notice to evacuate, please do so. 
https://twitter.com/ABC7/status/938714232790515712 QT @ABC7 #BREAKINGNEWS 101 Fwy closed in both directions at State Beaches, Bates Road north of Ventura as #ThomasFire burns on both sides of freeway http://abc7.la/2B4a0n4 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQb7nDSV4AA59a3.jpg
I urge anyone affected by the #SoCalFires to please register with http://www.safeandwell.org to let family and friends know you’re safe.

Thank you to the brave firefighters and first responders who are out there battling these wildfires. We owe you a debt of gratitude.

📄Papers (important documents)
💊Prescriptions
📷Photos
💻PC hard drives & disks
💳"Plastic" (credit/ATM cards) and cash
